import React from 'react' export default function ContentOneBar() { return (
{/* Content Header (Page header) */}

  2. viewing Ladkrabang's sensor

{/* /.row */}
{/* /.container-fluid */}
{/* /.content-header */} {/* Main content */}

Water level

Change to linegraph

6000 cm Highest level

rising

{/* /.d-flex */}
Ladkrabang {/* the word primary can be change to any color */} {/* Bangkapi*/} {/* Ladprao*/}
{/* /.card */}
{/* /.col-md-6 */}

Daily update

Expand

170 70 NTU 11/02/2020 9:00 am standard time
140 80 NTU 11/02/2020 9:00 am standard time
110 90 NTU 12/02/2020 9:00 am standard time
